body:
Some of you may know, on the walls map Overworld by Polar_Express, one of the spires has a little pre-built skybase on it, it also has a chest full of resources.

A sign that is located in this skybase challenges you to win the match only using the resources in chest from this skybase, so i tried it.

My Result: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jqXvgjiT0P4&feature=youtu.be

So has anybody else tried this? If so, how did you do?

title: Overworld SkyBase Challenge
